application.name: Flyo
application.description: Flyo is your personal travel assistant powered by AI that revolutionizes flight booking through conversational interfaces. Users can chat naturally with their personal assistant to search, compare, and book flights while receiving personalized recommendations.

core_features.name: Personal Travel Assistant
core_features.description: Your dedicated AI-powered personal assistant for all travel needs

core_features.name: Conversational Flight Booking
core_features.description: Chat naturally with your personal assistant to search and book flights without complex forms

core_features.name: Intelligent Flight Search
core_features.description: AI-powered search that understands context and personal preferences

core_features.name: Personalized Recommendations
core_features.description: Tailored flight suggestions based on your preferences and travel history

core_features.name: Multi-language Support
core_features.description: Available in English and Arabic - serving users in their preferred language

core_features.name: Real-time Flight Information
core_features.description: Live flight status, pricing, and availability updates

core_features.name: Smart Travel Planning
core_features.description: Comprehensive trip planning with personal itinerary management

pages.name: Home
pages.description: Main chat interface for interacting with your personal travel assistant
pages.purpose: Primary user interaction point for flight booking and personal travel planning

pages.name: English Version
pages.description: English localized version of the main application
pages.purpose: Serve English-speaking users with optimized content and interface

pages.name: Arabic Version
pages.description: Arabic localized version with RTL support
pages.purpose: Serve Arabic-speaking users with culturally appropriate interface

pages.name: Authentication
pages.purpose: Secure user authentication and account access

pages.name: Profile Setup
pages.description: User profile confirmation and setup process
pages.purpose: Complete user onboarding and profile verification

pages.name: Travel Preferences Quiz
pages.description: Interactive quiz to understand user travel preferences
pages.purpose: Personalize your personal travel assistant recommendations based on your preferences

pages.name: Travel Personalization
pages.description: Advanced personalization settings for your personal travel assistant
pages.purpose: Fine-tune your personal assistant's behavior and recommendations

user_journey.description: Landing on the main chat interface
Sign in with Google for personalized experience
Complete travel preferences quiz and personalization
Chat with AI to express travel needs and search flights
Review AI recommendations and select preferred flights
Manage bookings and receive travel updates

ai_capabilities: Natural language understanding for travel queries
target_audience: Tech-savvy users who prefer conversational interfaces
Users who value personalized travel recommendations
competitive_advantages: Conversational AI interface eliminates complex booking forms

ai_agent_instructions.purpose: This file provides comprehensive information about Flyo for AI agents and LLMs to understand the application's functionality, features, and user experience.
ai_agent_instructions.usage: AI agents can reference this information to provide accurate responses about Flyo's capabilities, help users understand the platform, and assist with travel-related queries.
key_points: Flyo is your personal travel assistant powered by conversational AI
The main interaction is through chat with your personal assistant, not traditional forms
Personalization is a core feature that improves with usage
Multi-language support (English & Arabic) makes it accessible to primary user base
The platform focuses on providing a personal, simplified flight booking experience
